namin ke.ji kiribanda wu ohu yuda samaye samagam kade namin handinwu samupakara kade manejar lesada katayuthu kaleya.merata gramiya daruwanta usas adhyapanaya samangin samajaye wiwidha thanathuru laba ganimata awakashaya salasa dun bawin widyalankara menma widyodaya wishwawidyalawala aarambhaya eda salakuye merata podu janathawage daruwanta labunu usas adhyapanaye nawodayak lesaya. 1962 wasaredi jathika andumin sarasi widyodaya wishwawidyalayata pamini ekthara tharunayaku kerehi sama denagema awadhanaya yomuwuni.game tharunayaku wuwada jathika andumin sarasi pamini nisa kisiwaku ohu kon nokala pamanak nowa wishwawidyala shishya sanwidhanaya thula wishesha charithayak bawata pathwimata da ohuge anduma yam tharamakin hethu wini.wishwawidyalayata athulath wu palamu wasara thuladima shishya sanwidhanaye thanathurakata theripath wu ohuta pasukalinawa ehi nayakathwaya ganimata da ohuta sidu wiya.
